Email_1.Subject: Unbelievable
Email_1.Body:
If you had done your job 19 people would
	still be alive today.  I hope you keep that in
	mind going forward if you want to keep your
   job.
	
	Your next assignment is available, but I'm
	warning you.  You're on thin ice.

Email_2.Subject: Don't Beat Yourself Up
Email_2.Body:
Hey, we all screwed up at some point. Just try
    and learn from it. You can't stop every crazy 
    you run into. Let's just make sure we stop the
    next one.
